TextView.android:text: Welcome to open hearts, This app is developed by 2 friends, As they wanted to help more people to do charity,Every Sunday we personally go to the places and donate the amount making a video as proof , as we care for betterment of society if the amount is very low.. we wait till we collect some huge amount and then we give it to donations where you selected Also, we send videos to the personalised ones who have donated the amount for the category we will write your name and amount in the database and save it.., so with trust just open the hearts for little kids at orphanage and for those Old people whose son/daughters dont care for them .. or dont give love to them.. we want to be their kids and love them... and proving that world is not a bad place to live.. thank you sir/ma'am..
